alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 7:54PM MST until December 23 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills between 30 and 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snowfall around one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph through 11 PM. * WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most susceptible parts of the body to frostbite are the extremities such as fingers, toes and the tip of the nose. If you must go outside, try to stay out of the wind, and dress in several layers of loose fitting, lightweight, warm clothing.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
